text: rice has been cultivated for over 10,000 years originating in the yangi river valley of China by 2000 BC rice spread to Southeast Asia and India becoming a staple in diets and agriculture there are over 40,000 varieties of rice with major types including iica Japonica and glutenous rice rice plays a vital role in cultures worldwide featuring in dishes like Rosado Biryani and sushi sh today rice is grown on every continent except Antarctica with China and India being the largest producers from ancient fields to Modern kitchens rice continues to be a Cornerstone of Global Food security
